meanings.definition: Tending to talk too much or reveal too much information.
meanings.sent1: She is the blabbiest person in our class, always sharing secrets.
meanings.sent2: The blabbiest child in the family never stops talking.
meanings.sent3: The blabbiest parrot in the pet store entertained everyone with its constant chatter.
meanings.sent4: Her blabbiest nature made her the perfect candidate for a talk show host.
meanings.sent5: The blabbiest squirrel in the park chattered away all day long.

meanings.sent1: She earned the title of the blabbiest in the office due to her constant gossiping.
meanings.sent2: The blabbiest at the party always had the juiciest stories to share.
meanings.sent3: The blabbiest in the neighborhood knew everyone's business.
meanings.sent4: Being the blabbiest in the group, she was always the first to spread news.
meanings.sent5: The blabbiest in the class could never keep a secret.
